review: I wish I had done a little more research before purchasing this product. The Google Crome plug-in that allows users to "cast" the computer screen onto the TV is beta and doesn't work with Amazon TV, in fact the list of items it does support is quite short. The Netflix app worked with Chromecast but we had many problems with the app and I believe this is a Netflix issue rather than Chromecast. If I could do it again, I'd try ROKU next time.
author: Robert W. Brummond

review: My internet is not very strong (1-1.5Mbps) but I am able to run Netflix and YouTube videos smoothly from this device (granted I can't run other video programs on my laptop/tablet at the same time.) Thus I contribute occasional issues to the internet, and not the device. This device will be even better when it is more compatible with other video programs.

review: I have tried to set this up a number of times. Apparently its range is barely 20 feet.  My Wireless Router is 22 feet from the  Adapterwhen it is plugged into the TV. I am going to add another wireless adapter on an extension USB cable to place the adapter within 10 feet of the TV. If that doesn't work, I plan to return the Adapter
